"Ah, <%me>!": "Who were they?"
"I haven't seen those two in ARKS before."
"Newly recruited ARKS members."
"Well, they just enlisted recently, after all."
"They're going to be my trainees from now on."
"I decided to accept Crawford's request for me to become an instructor, you see."
"They really wanted to say hello before they got started with their drills."
"\"It's such an honor to be able to train under the esteemed Ms. Aina.\"... Stuff like that."
"You're pretty popular."
"Professor Aina."
"Naaah... Ahaha..."
"It's nice to be looked up to like that, but..."
"Oh, stop! It's, y'know, embarrassing."
"Something those two said stuck out to me."
"They said we're famous."
"You, Manon, and I. The three of us are."
"Apparently, because we've fought in so many battles in all the regions, everyone's been talking about us."
"Kinda feels like we're heroes or something."
"Well, most of it's probably because of Crawford's publicity stunt..."
"It hasn't really sunk in for me."
"That was to boost everyone's morale."
"I know, right? It hasn't sunk in for me either."
"Yeah, and I realize that, but..."
"It's just... A lot of pressure."
"I mean, all I've really done is work my butt off just to be able to keep up with you and Manon."
"And now I'm the one doing the leading and I don't know the first thing about it."
"I'm not that amazing of an ARKS, you know?"
"But you are."
"You are the reason we're able to fight."
"Huh? I-I dunno..."
"R-Really?"
"You really think that of me?"
"...Yeah. You're right."
"If everyone's counting on me, then I can't just go and let them down, can I?"
"I'll try to become a good training instructor."
